title: Minecraft 12w19a 抢先版 发布
author: sjjklh
txt_content:
本帖最后由 sjjklh 于 2012-5-10 21:58 编辑 

是时候进行每周快照更新了！我们仍然在努力把客户端与服务端相分离，而且修正了一堆东西。我们也进行了：

为丛林加入可以结出可可的作物加入一种新的地图类型“大型生态群系”为不同的沙砖与光滑的石头方块添加了特定名称





It’s time for the weekly snapshot. We are continuing on the work to separate the client from the server, and have fixed a bunch of stuff related to that transition. We’ve also,
Added cocoa plants to junglesAdded a “large biomes” world typeAdded specific names for the different sandstone and smooth stone blocks



客户端: http://assets.minecraft.net/12w19a/minecraft.zip服务端: http://assets.minecraft.net/12w19a/minecraft_server.jar (或 EXE)







http://www.mojang.com/2012/05/minecraft-snapshot-12w19a/
